review:
Title: Reliable and Efficient Geyser from HavellsReview:I recently purchased the Havells geyser, and it has exceeded my expectations in every way. The build quality is excellent, with a sleek and modern design that complements my bathroom decor. It heats water quickly and efficiently, saving both time and energy.The temperature control is precise, and the safety features like the auto cut-off and shockproof body provide peace of mind. Installation was hassle-free, and the customer service team was very supportive.Overall, this geyser delivers excellent performance, is energy-efficient, and is well worth the investment. I highly recommend it for anyone looking for a reliable and durable water heater.
Read more

Best Feedback for Havells Instanio Prime 25 L“The Havells Instanio Prime 25-Litre Storage Water Heater is an excellent addition to my home. Its sleek design and vibrant color-changing LED indicator make it both functional and aesthetically pleasing. The 25-liter capacity is perfect for our family, providing enough hot water for showers and kitchen needs without running out.The heating is incredibly fast, and the high-density PUF insulation ensures the water stays warm for hours, saving on energy costs. I especially appreciate the Feroglas technology that keeps the tank durable and corrosion-free.The safety features, including the multi-function valve and protective anode rod, give me peace of mind. It’s easy to use, energy-efficient, and well-built. Havells has truly combined style, technology, and reliability in this water heater. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a premium geyser with great performance!”
